Quality Assurance Engineer (SAP R/3)



NRX Global Corp. provides solutions that enable Asset Lifecycle Management in capital-intensive industries. NRX helps organizations leverage plant asset data and existing applications to optimize maintenance, operations and engineering activities that support world-class asset management objectives.

We are currently looking for an SAP R/3 Quality Assurance Engineer to support the development of our SAP Enterprise Portals applications and R/3 integration packages. The candidate will be responsible for the quality assurance and deployment of these applications, and the support and maintenance of NRX’s SAP development environments.


The candidate will:
- Support, administer and upgrade
·SAP/R3
·SAP Enterprise Portal,
·WebLogic,Oracle or WebSphere J2EE platforms
·Oracle or SQL server RDBMS
- Perform regression, scalability, performance and systems level testing of J2EE and XML based applications utilizing R/3
- Interface with our software and hardware partners’ technical personnel

The candidate must possess:
- Experience in ABAP, BAPI, RFC, JCo, Business Connector, iDoc interfaces
- Experience with configuration and management of SAP R/3 specifically PM and MM modules
- Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
- Ability to analyze, define and document requirements for data, workflow, operating systems environment
- College or University degree in Computer Science

The position is located in downtown Toronto. Please submit your resume and salary expectations


Additional Information
Position Type: Full Time, Permanent  

Contact Information
